name: Cyclops Graveknight (Cold)

specials.name: Rejuvenation
specials.description: When a graveknight is destroyed, its armor rebuilds its body over the course of 1d10 days—or more quickly if the armor is worn by a living host. If the body is destroyed before then, the process restarts. A graveknight can only be permanently destroyed by obliterating its armor (such as with disintegrate), transporting it to the Positive Energy Plane, or throwing it into the heart of a volcano.

specials.name: Ferocity
specials.description: Trigger The cyclops graveknight is reduced to 0 HP. Effect The cyclops graveknight avoids being knocked out and remains at 1 HP, but its wounded value increases by 1. When it is wounded 3, it can no longer use this ability.

specials.name: Flash of Insight
specials.description: Frequency once per day; Trigger The cyclops graveknight is about to roll a d20. Effect The cyclops graveknight peers into an occluded spectrum of possible futures. It gets a success (but not a critical success) on the roll instead of rolling.

specials.name: Sacrilegious Aura
specials.description: 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a positive spell or ability, the cyclops graveknight automatically attempts to counteract it, with the +11 counteract modifier.

specials.name: Dark Deliverance
specials.description: The cyclops graveknight has positive resistance equal to its level.

specials.name: Sweep
specials.description: The cyclops graveknight makes a melee Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within its melee reach and adjacent to each other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature hit. A swipe counts as two attacks for the cyclops graveknight multiple attack penalty.

specials.name: Devastating Blast
specials.description: The cyclops graveknight unleashes a 30-foot cone of energy. Creatures in the area must make a DC 20 Reflex save or take 4d12  fire damage. The cyclops graveknight can use this ability once every 1d4 rounds.

specials.name: Weapon Master
specials.description: The cyclops graveknight has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapons it wields.

specials.name: Ruinous Weapons
specials.description: Any weapon the cyclops graveknight wields gains the effects of the frost weapon rune, respectively, in addition to a +1 striking weapon rune.

specials.name: Graveknight Curse
specials.description: This curse affects anyone who wears a cyclops graveknight’s armor for at least 1 hour. Saving Throw 21 Will save; Onset 1 hour; Stage 1 doomed 1 and cannot remove the armor (1 day); Stage 2 doomed 2, hampered 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day); Stage 3 dies and transforms into the armor’s graveknight.

items: Greataxe, heavy crossbow (10 bolts), +1 resilient hide armor

immunity.value: death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, unconscious, fire
